mapper.select: select resv_num, charge_price, resv_Date, whether_to_cancel, resv_EDate, user_id, tour_num from reservations where user_id = #{userId} order by resv_num desc

select r.resv_num, r.charge_price, r.resv_date, r.whether_to_cancel, r.resv_edate, r.user_id, r.tour_num, t.tour_name, t.tour_sdate, t.tour_edate, t.tour_price, ti.tourimage_name from tour.reservations r left outer join tour.tours t on r.tour_num = t.tour_num left outer join tour.tour_images ti on t.tour_num = ti.tour_num where r.user_id = #{userId} order by resv_num desc
